Package characters

Class Officer

java.lang.Object
screen.ScreenObject
characters.Actor
characters.Officer
public class Officer extends Actor
This class represents an officer which is a type of an actor
Author:
Ishwar with small contributions from Dhruv

    • adjustV

      public void adjustV​(int codeX, int codeY)
      Adjusts the 2D velocity of the officer.
      Parameters:
      codeX - if codeX < 0, the x-velocity of the officer will become negative;
      if codeX > 0, the x-velocity of the officer will become positive;
      else, the x-velocity will be set to 0.
      codeY - if codeY < 0, the y-velocity of the officer will become negative;
      if codeY > 0, the y-velocity of the officer will become positive;
      else, the y-velocity will be set to 0.

    • useTeleporter

      public boolean useTeleporter​(HauntedMaze maze)
      Uses the teleporter to teleport the person to a random location
      Parameters:
      maze - the HauntedMaze where the teleportation happens
      Returns:
      true if it was successful.

    • usePathFinder

      public void usePathFinder​(HauntedMaze maze)
      Finds the shortest path to the nearest blueprint.
      Parameters:
      maze - the HauntedMaze where the path finder happens

    • drawPathFinder

      public void drawPathFinder​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws the shortest path to the nearest blueprint.
      Parameters:
      marker - the PApplet object with which to draw the path finder
